pages.text: Bees for Thermal. Only special material bees are shown here, for common materials like copper and tin go to the $(l:bees/modded/ingot_bees)list of ingot bees$(/l)

pages.title: Basalz Bee
pages.text: This bee cannot be bred. Spawn egg is crafted from a $(l:bees/hive/diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) spawn egg using a Smelter.

pages.title: Blitz Bee
pages.text: This bee cannot be bred. Spawn egg is crafted from a $(l:bees/hive/diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) spawn egg using a Smelter.

pages.title: Blizz Bee
pages.text: This bee cannot be bred. Spawn egg is crafted from a $(l:bees/hive/diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) spawn egg using a Chiller.
